mapper.select: SELECT cs.id,cs.tag_value AS tagValue,c.item_name AS itemName,u.logo_path AS logoPath,cs.uid, su.user_name AS managerPhone,su.real_name AS managerName,u.user_name AS userName,u.real_name AS realName, cs.community_id AS communityId FROM app_community_staff cs INNER JOIN app_community c ON c.id=cs.community_id INNER JOIN sys_user su ON su.id=c.uid INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=cs.uid where cs.id=#{id}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM app_community_staff cs INNER JOIN app_community c ON c.id=cs.community_id INNER JOIN sys_user su ON su.id=c.uid INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=cs.uid
and cs.tag_value = #{tagValue}
and c.item_name like '%${itemName}%'
and su.user_name like '%${managerPhone}%'
and u.real_name like '%${realName}%'
SELECT id,CONCAT(user_name,' ------- ',real_name) AS `text` FROM sys_user WHERE user_name LIKE '${userName}%' AND (position='动能集团员工' OR position='动能集团合作伙伴')
mapper.sql: id, community_id, tag_value, tag_type, uid, create_time
mapper.update:
update app_community_staff
community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
tag_value = #{tagValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tag_type = #{tagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into app_community_staff
community_id,
tag_value,
tag_type,
uid,
create_time,
#{communityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{tagValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

insert into app_community_staff (community_id, tag_value, tag_type, uid, create_time) values
(#{item.communityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.tagValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.delete:
delete from app_community_staff where id in
#{item}
